description: The PAT_ENC_DOSNG_PLAN table contains the dosing plans for anticoagulation patients when using the calendar based tracking section. This table contains the recurring instructions to the patient.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: DOSING_PLAN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The anticoagulation dosing plan type of pattern (every day, weekly, alternating).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Everyday


Alternating


Weekly

columns.name: PLAN_REPEAT_DAYS
columns.description: The number of days after which the anticoagulation dosing plan will repeat for an alternating pattern.

columns.name: ALT_PLAN_RESTART_YN
columns.description:
Yes or no value of whether or not the user or the system checked the "Start on the first day of the cycle" check box in the anticoagulation calendar based plan editor.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: ALT_PLAN_START_DAY
columns.description: A numeric item to keep track of the start day in the cycle for an alternating anticoagulation plan.

columns.name: PLAN_START_DATE
columns.description: The date that the new anticoagulation dosing plan will start.

columns.name: PLAN_CHANGE_DATE
columns.description: The date the anticoagulation dosing plan was changed.

columns.name: DOSING_PLAN_TEXT
columns.description: A textual description of the anticoagulation dosing plan.

columns.name: DOSE_INST_FULL_TEXT
columns.description: A textual description of the anticoagulation full dosing instructions, includes holds, overrides and dosing plan.

columns.name: DAILY_DOSE_DAY1
columns.description: Daily dose for day 1 of an anticoagulation dosing plan.

columns.name: DAILY_DOSE_DAY2
columns.description: Daily dose for day 2 of an anticoagulation dosing plan.

columns.name: DAILY_DOSE_DAY3
columns.description: Daily dose for day 3 of an anticoagulation dosing plan.

columns.name: DAILY_DOSE_DAY4
columns.description: Daily dose for day 4 of an anticoagulation dosing plan.

columns.name: DAILY_DOSE_DAY5
columns.description: Daily dose for day 5 of an anticoagulation dosing plan.

columns.name: DAILY_DOSE_DAY6
columns.description: Daily dose for day 6 of an anticoagulation dosing plan.

columns.name: DAILY_DOSE_DAY7
columns.description: Daily dose for day 7 of an anticoagulation dosing plan.

columns.name: PILL_SIZE_DAY1
columns.description: Pill size for day 1 of an anticoagulation dosing plan.

columns.name: PILL_SIZE_DAY2
columns.description: Pill size for day 2 of an anticoagulation dosing plan.

columns.name: PILL_SIZE_DAY3
columns.description: Pill size for day 3 of an anticoagulation dosing plan.

columns.name: PILL_SIZE_DAY4
columns.description: Pill size for day 4 of an anticoagulation dosing plan.

columns.name: PILL_SIZE_DAY5
columns.description: Pill size for day 5 of an anticoagulation dosing plan.

columns.name: PILL_SIZE_DAY6
columns.description: Pill size for day 6 of an anticoagulation dosing plan.

columns.name: PILL_SIZE_DAY7
columns.description: Pill size for day 7 of an anticoagulation dosing plan.

columns.name: NUMBER_PILLS_DAY1
columns.description: Number of pills for day 1 of an anticoagulation dosing plan.

columns.name: NUMBER_PILLS_DAY2
columns.description: Number of pills for day 2 of an anticoagulation dosing plan.

columns.name: NUMBER_PILLS_DAY3
columns.description: Number of pills for day 3 of an anticoagulation dosing plan.

columns.name: NUMBER_PILLS_DAY4
columns.description: Number of pills for day 4 of an anticoagulation dosing plan.

columns.name: NUMBER_PILLS_DAY5
columns.description: Number of pills for day 5 of an anticoagulation dosing plan.

columns.name: NUMBER_PILLS_DAY6
columns.description: Number of pills for day 6 of an anticoagulation dosing plan.

columns.name: NUMBER_PILLS_DAY7
columns.description: Number of pills for day 7 of an anticoagulation dosing plan.

columns.name: WEEKLY_TOTAL
columns.description: The total weekly dose or average weekly dose the patient was instructed to take for an anticoagulation dosing plan.
